description: Richard Engel reports hearing air raid sirens near Jerusalem's Old City as part of the air defense system in order to intercept Iran’s retaliatory attack drones. Officials reported that the U.S. military shot down some of the Iranian drones.
title: Sirens heard in several parts of Israel amid Iranian drone strike

description: A new California restaurant claims to be the first fully autonomous restaurant, with its burgers and fries made by robots. As fast food chains increasingly try to find ways for machines to replace some human workers, NBC News’ Elwyn Lopez gets an inside look.
title: Robots cook your burger and fries at this new California fast food restaurant
